Newt_start.text: Newt clocks in, shaking from a Red Bull overdose.

Newt_GreetQuietly.text: The manager stares. A Karen storms in, waving a receipt.

options.label: Let the lunch rush distract her

Newt_ArgueWithKaren.text: You get fired for arguing with a customer. Newt's fast food career is over.

Munchies_start.text: Munchies clocks in, munching on a cold fry.

Munchies_CrankTunes.text: The manager walks in. Music's too loud!

options.label: Kill the tunes & work the rush

Munchies_ArgueWithManager.text: You're out! Munchies gets sent home. Back to the couch.

Carly_start.text: Carly flips her braid and sharpens her nametag.

options.label: Head to the front for lunch rush

Carly_FlirtWithCustomer.text: Awkward. The customer is her high school math teacher.

Carly_MakeAScene.text: She gets written up for inappropriate conduct. So much for Employee of the Month.

shared_LunchRush.text: The restaurant explodes with hungry customers. It's chaos for everyone!

options.label: Panic and hide in the freezer

Newt_SurviveRush.text: Newt survives and even gets promoted to fries captain. Legend!

Munchies_SurviveRush.text: Munchies becomes a kitchen legend. Free nuggets for life.

Carly_SurviveRush.text: Carly runs the front like a boss. Customers actually tip. What?

Newt_LoseIt.text: Newt freezes up in the freezer. You can't win 'em all.

Munchies_LoseIt.text: Munchies hides in the walk-in cooler. Manager isn't impressed.

Carly_LoseIt.text: Carly panics and spills drinks everywhere. Game over.
